description: On Ubuntu 20.10, i cannot open the program.

I haven't the time to try to figure it out, I will try something else but see below for the problem running this software.

Running from command line (using the menu command):

:~$ sugar-activity3 AbiWordActivity.AbiWordActivity
Usage: sugar-activity3 [options] [activity dir] [python class]

Options:
 -h, --help      show this help message and exit
 -b BUNDLE_ID, --bundle-id=BUNDLE_ID
            identifier of the activity bundle
 -a ACTIVITY_ID, --activity-id=ACTIVITY_ID
            identifier of the activity instance
 -o OBJECT_ID, --object-id=OBJECT_ID
            identifier of the associated datastore object
 -u URI, --uri=URI   URI to load
 -s, --single-process start all the instances in the same process
 -i, --invited     the activity is being launched for handling an invite
            from the network

If you are running from a directory containing an Activity, the argument may
be omitted. Otherwise please provide either a directory containing a Sugar
Activity [activity dir], a [python_class], or both.
Leider startet das Programm nicht. Ursache unklar.

Das Programm startet einfach nicht. Ich habe auch wirklich keine Lust auf die Wiki-Seite zu gehen und irgendetwas einzustellen,wenn es überhaupt reparabel sein sollte. Muss alles nicht nerven. Nervt aber.
